1.「やる気 出ないわー。| お前の顔を彫るって 約束はしたんだけどー。| やる気が: I'm not motivated. I promised I'd carve your|face, but... I just don't feel like it.

2.<cs_pchero>は マカイ・マカロンの箱を|そっと 差し出した。: <cs_pchero>The "Mere Old Man" gently holds out a box of|makai macarons...

4.「スライムのように 愛らしいフォルム！| 魔界で 唯一無二の ふわサク感！| 優:
It's as adorable as a slime! The one and only|fluffiness in the demon world! The sweetness|of the cake will make even the most stinking|
|corpse weep...

5.「ゼクレス王家も御用達 マカイ・マカロン！| こいつを ワシに くれるってのか！: The royal house of Zecres is proud to present|the Makai Macaroon! You're giving this to me?

6.「あ…甘い物とか| べつに 好きじゃないけど……| もらっといてやる！: Uh... I'm not into sweets, it's not like...|I'll take it!

9.「フンっ！| なかなか やるじゃない！: Hmph! You're pretty good at that!

10.「……仕方ねえなー。| あんだけ硬い 幻獣のツノも 初めてだったし。| お前の顔: ... I don't have a choice... I've never seen|a phantom horn that hard before. I'm gonna|carve your face!

11.「まあ…… それでも | ここに並ぶ ４人の大魔王に比べたら| まだまだ ひよっ: Well... Still, compared to the four demons|lined up here, I'm still just a little kid!

12.「特に ネロドスなんか 本当にいい男だったぜ。| １０００年前に 死んじまったが: Especially Nerodos. He's a really nice guy...|He died a thousand years ago... You're not|even close to Nerodos.

14.「この 大ウソつきめ！| ちょっとばかし強いからって お前ごときが| 不死の魔王: You big, fat liar! Just because you're a|little stronger doesn't mean you can beat the|Immortal Demon King Nerodos!

15.「ネロドスの顔を彫ったのは ワシだ。 | そして ワシは 自分の作品から そのモ: Nerodos' face was carved by... And I can|create visions of the model's past from my|work!

16.「こいつは 本物の ネロドスとちがって | 不死のチカラこそないが 本物なみに: Unlike the real Nerodos, this one doesn't|have immortality, but it's just as good as|the real thing...

17.「お前が ネロドスに勝てるほど| 強いというなら 証明してみせろ！| そうすりゃ: If you are strong enough to beat Nerodos,|prove it! Then I'll carve your face on it!
